itunes:title: #143: 5 Signs You Feel Protected in a Relationship
title: #143: 5 Signs You Feel Protected in a Relationship
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: To feel protected in a relationship is one of the biggest blessings but should ALSO be a standard that you hold for every partnership and friendship you have. In this episode, I will talk about 5 signs that you are in a relationship where you are...
itunes:summary:
To feel protected in a relationship is one of the biggest blessings but should ALSO be a standard that you hold for every partnership and friendship you have.

In this episode, I will talk about 5 signs that you are in a relationship where you are feeling protected and seen.

 

Ready to let your loved ones in or provide space for those who want to love you? Check out the Let Them Love You Workshop to gain skills and make love easier.

Register for the Let Them Love You Workshop

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Coaching Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
  • Come to our next Healed and Loved Woman Retreat
